entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is a person who is shaking hands with Harry. He is described as having his hands shake, indicating that he might be nervous or anxious.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a person who has been missing for weeks. Her clothes are gone and her bed hasn't been slept in, indicating that she might have left the house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is concerned about Luna's disappearance. He is described as saying 'Where is she?' and 'And why do you keep looking out of the window?'

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is present with Harry and Hermione. He draws his wand when Xenophilius drops the tray.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is present with Harry and Ron. She draws her wand when Xenophilius drops the tray.

entities.name: quibblers
entities.description: Quibblers are objects that come streaming across the floor from underneath the tablecloth after the printing press gives a huge bang.

relationships.description: Xenophilius is concerned about Luna's disappearance. He says 'I don't think Luna's been here for weeks' and looks out of the window.
Harry is questioning Xenophilius about Luna's disappearance. He says 'Where is she?' and 'And why do you keep looking out of the window?'
Harry is concerned about Luna's disappearance. He asks Xenophilius where she is.
Ron reacts to Xenophilius dropping the tray by drawing his wand.
Hermione reacts to Xenophilius dropping the tray by drawing her wand.
